channel.title: Jessamyn West / @jessamyn
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @jessamyn. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: R to @djllu: I very much appreciate you keeping the heat on about this.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: I very much appreciate you keeping the heat on about this.

item.title: R to @jillithd: this is exactly my feeling. I haven't seen Soul Asylum since college but it was an incredibly lively show that I was happy I'd seen. They did a cover of "play that funky music white boy" that was memorable.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: this is exactly my feeling. I haven't seen Soul Asylum since college but it was an incredibly lively show that I was happy I'd seen. They did a cover of "play that funky music white boy" that was memorable.

item.title: R to @Bondcliff2008: There are a lot of very agitated liberal do-gooders on local mailing lists trying to encourage even beg other people to take them because they can't bear responsibility for getting rid of the trash they've generated.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: There are a lot of very agitated liberal do-gooders on local mailing lists trying to encourage even beg other people to take them because they can't bear responsibility for getting rid of the trash they've generated.

item.title: R to @INALJNaomi: I've posted information on doing this to the ALA Connect Member and Councilor communities. Hoping people do.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: I've posted information on doing this to the ALA Connect Member and Councilor communities. Hoping people do.

item.title: R to @vlowe144: Congratulations and welcome.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Congratulations and welcome.

item.title: R to @RudeMechanic: My "application" literally just said "I am a woman on the internet"
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: My "application" literally just said "I am a woman on the internet"

item.title: R to @weebilsurglace: Right?! I read that too and loved it (and then Googled it to make sure I had it right in the article).
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Right?! I read that too and loved it (and then Googled it to make sure I had it right in the article).

item.title: R to @_loveallthis: I know this sounds strange coming from me but I kind of think the blue checkmark situation is a scam. Like, I applied and got verified for the usual reasons but I don't get the feeling that it's a robust program in a lot of ways.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: I know this sounds strange coming from me but I kind of think the blue checkmark situation is a scam. Like, I applied and got verified for the usual reasons but I don't get the feeling that it's a robust program in a lot of ways.

item.title: Fair warning: when people take over accounts belonging to brands on here, they often take over their blue checkmarks too. https://fortune.com/2022/05/26/radioshack-cryptocurrency-swap-platform-success/
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Fair warning: when people take over accounts belonging to brands on here, they often take over their blue checkmarks too. fortune.com/2022/05/26/radio…

item.title: R to @UNSTABLEPOSTING: To be fair, the same is true for Newsweek, minus the crypto part.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: To be fair, the same is true for Newsweek, minus the crypto part.

item.title: R to @jessamyn: Bishop Levi Jenkins Coppin was unusual in that two of his wives had Wikipedia articles about them but he did not. I'm not well-versed in A.M.E. Church traditions, but a large number of his works survive and can speak for themselves. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levi_Coppin
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Bishop Levi Jenkins Coppin was unusual in that two of his wives had Wikipedia articles about them but he did not. I'm not well-versed in A.M.E. Church traditions, but a large number of his works survive and can speak for themselves. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levi_C…

item.title: R to @jessamyn: Book 77: More light fiction set in a library/bookstore! This one is about saving a small library in the UK (which many librarians know is still a thing). Sweet and straightforward, goes nowhere surprising, doesn't end quite like you think, but a good read in these tough times
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Book 77: More light fiction set in a library/bookstore! This one is about saving a small library in the UK (which many librarians know is still a thing). Sweet and straightforward, goes nowhere surprising, doesn't end quite like you think, but a good read in these tough times

item.title: R to @mmhfraser: I'll be honest, I agree with everything you are saying but also on-site housing seems like one of my library dreams come true.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: I'll be honest, I agree with everything you are saying but also on-site housing seems like one of my library dreams come true.

item.title: R to @anson_ag: This is a great tool but I get the feeling the data isn't great for Vermont. I looked up where I live (Randolph) and pretty sure we've got a summer meals program but there's nothing on that fancy map. Will stress 2-1-1 instead.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: This is a great tool but I get the feeling the data isn't great for Vermont. I looked up where I live (Randolph) and pretty sure we've got a summer meals program but there's nothing on that fancy map. Will stress 2-1-1 instead.

item.title: R to @voxdeb: Hallo tiny shiny pumpamokins!
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Hallo tiny shiny pumpamokins!

item.title: R to @Bondcliff2008: We had neighbors who had a finished basement which was very different from our messy unfinished basement. They had Pong down there and a bar.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: We had neighbors who had a finished basement which was very different from our messy unfinished basement. They had Pong down there and a bar.

item.title: R to @eflask: Yeah, my feeling exactly. If I am in charge I fall down on the job, not diplomatic enough, don't care enough about the process. As vice chair (I am vice chair of the Board of Civil Authority) I can run a meeting in a pinch, but not, like, every time.
item.dc:creator: @jessamyn
item.description: Yeah, my feeling exactly. If I am in charge I fall down on the job, not diplomatic enough, don't care enough about the process. As vice chair (I am vice chair of the Board of Civil Authority) I can run a meeting in a pinch, but not, like, every time.
